title: Coursify
content: I developed Coursify, an e-learning web app using the MERN stack. I utilized MongoDB for course management, designed the backend with Express and Node.js for smooth data handling, and crafted a responsive user interface with React and Material UI. Additionally, I implemented secure user authentication with JWT to ensure data privacy and secure course access.

title: KnowYourPlace
content: I developed a responsive weather news application using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I integrated the OpenWeather API for real-time weather information and forecasts, utilized the Geolocation API for automatic location detection and geocoding, and incorporated the NewsCatcher API to fetch news articles related to the user's country.
